oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Couple in Front of the I.W. Gernert Homes, c.1960s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of a couple standing in front of the I.W. Gernert Homes (Project Tenn. 5-14), circa 1960s. The Gernert Homes were completed in 1965, and were the city's first low-rent housing project for the elderly. Located at 12th Avenue South and Edgehill Avenue, the high-rise building contained 90 efficiency apartments and 18 one-bedroom apartments. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
